description: Umnyango wakho kwixesha eliqaqambileyo. Apha kwiindawo Zezithuba, sizinikezela ekubhekaneni nengxaki ebalulekileyo yokungabikho kwemisebenzi kubantu abasele bephumelele. Sihamba sizama ukuvumela imfundo kunye nemisebenzi. Iwebhusayithi yethu ebanzi ikhethwe ukunceda abafundi abavela kwiinkqubo zezikolo kunye nabaqalayo bezezimali ngezakhono, izixhobo, kunye nokuxhaswa abaninzi abadingayo ukuze baphumelele kumzi mveliso ophakathi kweemeko ezinzima.
